DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study demonstrate efficacy SPD489 compare placebo adult ( 18 55 year age inclusive ) moderate severe Binge Eating Disorder Visit 8 ( Weeks 11 12 ) measure number binge day ( defined day least 1 binge episode occur ) per week assess clinical interview base subject diary
DOC.brief_title: SPD489 Adults Aged 18-55 Years With Moderate Severe Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.criteria: The subject enrol study follow inclusion criterion ( include test result ) meet : 1 . Subject 1855 year age . 2 . Subject meet follow Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders Fourth Edition Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) criteria diagnosis BED : 3 . Subject BED diagnosis . 4 . Subject 's BED least moderate severity subject report least 3 binge eating day per week . 5 . Female subject must negative serum BHCG pregnancy test negative urine pregnancy test agree comply applicable contraceptive requirement . Subjects exclude study follow exclusion criterion meet : 1 . Subject concurrent symptom bulimia nervosa anorexia nervosa . 2 . Subject receive psychotherapy ( eg , supportive psychotherapy , cognitive behavior therapy , interpersonal therapy ) weight loss support ( eg , Weight Watchers ) BED . 3 . Subject use psychostimulants facilitate fast diet part BED . 4 . Subject lifetime history psychosis , mania , hypomania , dementia , ADHD . 5 . Subject consider suicide risk , previously make suicide attempt , currently demonstrate active suicidal ideation . 6 . Subject known history symptomatic cardiovascular disease , advanced arteriosclerosis , structural cardiac abnormality , cardiomyopathy , serious heart rhythm abnormality , coronary artery disease , serious cardiac problem . 7 . Subject history moderate severe hypertension . 8 . Subject female pregnant nursing . 9 . Subject bariatric surgery , lap band , duodenal stent , procedure weight loss .
